property.name: template
property.label: Regular expression representing the input data to be scanned
property.description: The regular expression should contain the following named capture groups: F, L, C, E, P and K

property.name: sobject
property.label: Target SObject
property.description: API name of the SObject where we use to create a new record

property.name: firstname
property.label: Firstname field (mapped to <F>) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map <F>

property.name: lastname
property.label: Lastname field (mapped to <L>) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map <L>

property.name: company
property.label: Company field (mapped to <C>) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map <C>

property.name: email
property.label: Email field (mapped to <E>) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map <E>

property.name: phone
property.label:
Phone field (mapped to

) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map

property.name: referenceId
property.label: Salesforce ID field reference (mapped to <K>) -- leave it empty if not used.
property.description: API name of the field to use to map <K>
